altername_name: バーチャルギャロップ騎手道
name: Virtual Gallop Kishudou
overview: Virtual Gallop Kishudou is a game similar to other horse racing titles like the Gallop Racer series, you select a rider and a horse and try to win the races. The game features different game modes: - Normal game: The player select a horse and compite in different races. - Vs Winai: The player race against Wina only. - Winai story: The player can see pictures and videos of the career of Wina - Keiba Book - Database
